name: Modules.WebDialog
summary: Allows a Titanium application to use the Safari Controller (iOS) and Chrome Tabs (Android) to create an embedded browser.

events.name: open
events.summary: The open event is fired after the web dialog has opened.

properties.name: url
properties.summary: The URL provided when opening the web dialog.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

events.name: close
events.summary: The close event is fired when the web dialog is closed by the user or programmatically.

properties.name: url
properties.summary: The URL provided when opening the web dialog.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

events.name: load
events.summary: Fired when the initial URL load is complete.
events.description: This event is invoked when the erb dialog completes the loading of the URL that you pass to it's initializer. It is not invoked for any subsequent page loads in the same web dialog instance.

properties.name: url
properties.summary: The URL provided when opening the web dialog.

properties.name: success
properties.summary: Returns true if loading completed successfully, false otherwise.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

events.name: redirect
events.summary: Fired when the browser is redirected to another URL before the first page load finishes.

properties.name: url
properties.summary: The URL provided when opening the web dialog.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

properties.name: source
properties.summary: Source object that fired the event.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: Name of the event fired.

methods.name: close
methods.description:
var dialog = require('ti.webdialog');
if (dialog.isOpen()) {
    dialog.close();
}

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by Modules.WebDialog.AuthenticationSession except those marked not-creation or read-only.

methods.name: isOpen
methods.summary: Indicates if the web dialog is open.

methods.name: isSupported
methods.summary: Indicates if the web dialog is supported.

methods.name: open
methods.summary: Opens the web dialog with the options provided.
methods.description:
var dialog = require('ti.webdialog');
if (dialog.isSupported()) {
    dialog.open({
        url: 'https://appcelerator.com',
        title: 'Hello World',
        tintColor: 'red'
    });
}

parameters.name: params
parameters.summary: Dictionary used to configure the web dialog.

constants.name: DISMISS_BUTTON_STYLE_CANCEL
constants.summary: Button style used to display a localized "Cancel" button.

constants.name: DISMISS_BUTTON_STYLE_CLOSE
constants.summary: Button style used to display a localized "Close" button.

constants.name: DISMISS_BUTTON_STYLE_DONE
constants.summary: Button style used to display a localized "Done" button.
